ygData.subject: Re: [neat] Extinction Event

Colin Green wrote:

>
>2) Changing the fitness function. We choose a function based on the 
>problem at hand, so it doesn't seem sensible to switch to a different 
>function. But often we come up with different ways of evaluating netwoks 
>for a given problem and we often have discussions about what is the best 
>function. What if we were to code up a few of theses different functions 
>and allow NEAT to periodically switch between them. This then could be 
>something akin to an extinction event occuring in nature and changing 
>the fitness landscape.
>
>  
>
.... or if your function has a bunch of measures that are weighted to 
give a final fitness score you could just change the weighting 
occasionally.
